verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Descending <S%G2597><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Great : <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Was Enlightened <S%G5461><s%> With <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> His Glory. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2896><s%> He Cried <S%G1722><s%> Mightily <S%G2479><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Is Fallen, <S%G4098><s%> Is Fallen <S%G4098><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Become <S%G1096><s%> A Habitation <S%G2732><s%> Of Demons, <S%G1142><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Hold <S%G5438><s%> Of Every <S%G3956><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Unclean, <S%G169><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Hold <S%G5438><s%> Of Every <S%G3956><s%> Bird <S%G3732><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hated : <S%G3404><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fury <S%G2372><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fornication <S%G4202><s%> Of Her <S%G846><s%> Have Drunk <S%G4095><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations; <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Did Commit Fornication, <S%G4203><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Merchants <S%G1713><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Through <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4764><s%> Of Her Luxury <S%G846><s%> Were Enriched. <S%G4147><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Come Ye <S%G1831><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> My People, <S%G3450><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Ye May Not Have Fellowship <S%G4790><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> In Her Sins, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Ye May Not Receive <S%G2983><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Plagues <S%G4127><s%> Her : <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> As Far As <S%G891><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Remembered <S%G3421><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G92><s%> Her Unrighteousness. <S%G846><s%>

Render <S%G591><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G846><s%> <S%G3778><s%> Rendered <S%G591><s%>, To You; <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Double Ye <S%G1363><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> Double, <S%G1362><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Her Works. <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cup <S%G4221><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> She Mixed, <S%G2767><s%> Mix You <S%G2767><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> Double. <S%G1362><s%>

So Much As <S%G3745><s%> She Glorified <S%G1392><s%>, Herself <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lived Luxuriously, <S%G4763><s%> So Much <S%G5118><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> To Her <S%G846><s%> Torment <S%G929><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mourning. <S%G3997><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Her Heart <S%G846><s%> She Says, <S%G3004><s%> I Sit <S%G2521><s%> A Queen, <S%G938><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Widow <S%G5503><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Am Not : <S%G1510><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mourning <S%G3997><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> May I See. <S%G1492><s%>

On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Shall Come <S%G2240><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4127><s%> Her Plagues, <S%G846><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mourning <S%G3997><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Famine, <S%G3042><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> She Shall Be Burnt; <S%G2618><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Strong Is The <S%G2478><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Judges <S%G2919><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Weep For <S%G2799><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Bewail <S%G2875><s%> ' For <S%G1909><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kings <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Committed Fornication <S%G4203><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lived Luxuriously, <S%G4763><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> They See <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4451><s%> Of Her Burning, <S%G846><s%>

From <S%G575><s%> Afar <S%G3113><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G929><s%> Of Her Torment, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Babylon, <S%G897><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Strong! <S%G2478><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Is Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2920><s%> Thy Judgment. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Merchants <S%G1713><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Weep <S%G2799><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mourn <S%G3996><s%> ' For <S%G1909><s%>, Her, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1117><s%> Their Lading <S%G846><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Buys <S%G59><s%> Any More; <S%G3765><s%>

Lading <S%G1117><s%> Of Gold, <S%G5557><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Silver, <S%G696><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Stone <S%G3037><s%> Precious, <S%G5093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Pearl, <S%G3135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Fine Linen, <S%G1040><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Purple, <S%G4209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Of Silk, <S%G4596><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Scarlet, <S%G2847><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Wood <S%G3586><s%> Thyine, <S%G2367><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Article <S%G4632><s%> Of Ivory, <S%G1661><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Article <S%G4632><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Wood <S%G3586><s%> Most Precious, <S%G5093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Brass, <S%G5475><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Iron, <S%G4604><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Marble, <S%G3139><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Cinnamon, <S%G2792><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Incense, <S%G2368><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ointment, <S%G3464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Frankincense, <S%G3030><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wine, <S%G3631><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Oil, <S%G1637><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Finest Flour, <S%G4585><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wheat, <S%G4621><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cattle, <S%G2934><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sheep, <S%G4263><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Horses, <S%G2462><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Chariots, <S%G4480><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Slaves, <S%G4983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Souls <S%G5590><s%> Of Men. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ripe Fruits <S%G3703><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Desire <S%G1939><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> Of Thy Soul <S%G4675><s%> Are Departed <S%G565><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fat Things <S%G3045><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bright Things <S%G2986><s%> Are Departed <S%G565><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Any More <S%G3765><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shouldest Thou Find <S%G2147><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Merchants <S%G1713><s%> Of These Things, <S%G5130><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Were Enriched <S%G4147><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Afar <S%G3113><s%> Shall Stand <S%G2476><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G929><s%> Of Her Torment, <S%G846><s%> Weeping <S%G2799><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mourning, <S%G3996><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Which Was <S%G3588><s%> Clothed With <S%G4016><s%> Fine Linen <S%G1039><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Purple <S%G4210><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Scarlet, <S%G2847><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Decked <S%G5558><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Gold <S%G5557><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> Precious <S%G5093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pearls! <S%G3135><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> Was Made Desolate <S%G2049><s%> <S%G3588><s%> So Great <S%G5118><s%> Wealth. <S%G4149><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Steersman, <S%G2942><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> In <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ships <S%G4143><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Company, <S%G3658><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sailors, <S%G3492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2281><s%> Trade By Sea, <S%G2038><s%> <S%G575><s%> Afar Off <S%G3113><s%> Stood, <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Cried, <S%G2896><s%> Seeing <S%G3708><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Smoke <S%G2586><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Burning <S%G4451><s%> Of Her, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What City Is <S%G5101><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great? <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Cast <S%G906><s%> Dust <S%G5522><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> Their Heads, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cried, <S%G2896><s%> Weeping <S%G2799><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mourning, <S%G3996><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> Woe, <S%G3759><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Were Enriched <S%G4147><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Ships <S%G4143><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> Through <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5094><s%> Her Costliness! <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> She Was Made Desolate. <S%G2049><s%>

Rejoice <S%G2165><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> O Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And Ye <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> And Ye <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Prophets; <S%G4396><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Did Judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2917><s%> Your Judgment <S%G5216><s%> Upon <S%G1537><s%> Her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Took Up <S%G142><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Strong <S%G2478><s%> A Stone, <S%G3037><s%> As A 5613 ADV Millstone 3458 N-ASM Great, 3173 A-ASM And 2532 CONJ Cast 906 V-2AAI-3S It Into 1519 PREP The 3588 T-ASF Sea, 2281 N-ASF, Saying, 3004 V-PAP-NSM Thus 3779 ADV With Violence 3731 N-DSN Shall Be Cast Down 906 V-FPI-3S Babylon 897 N-NSF The 3588 T-NSF Great 3173 A-NSF City, 4172 N-NSF And 2532 CONJ 3756 PRT-N Not At All 3361 PRT-N May Be Found 2147 V-APS-3S Longer : 2089 ADV

And <S%G2532><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Harpers <S%G2790><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Musicians <S%G3451><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Flute Players <S%G834><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Trumpeters <S%G4538><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> May Be Heard <S%G191><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Longer, <S%G2089><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Artificer <S%G5079><s%> Of Any <S%G3956><s%> Art <S%G5078><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> May Be Found <S%G2147><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Longer, <S%G2089><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sound <S%G5456><s%> Of Millstone <S%G3458><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> May Be Heard <S%G191><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Longer, <S%G2089><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> Of Lamp <S%G3088><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> May Shine <S%G5316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Longer, <S%G2089><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Of Bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Bride <S%G3565><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not At All <S%G3361><s%> May Be Heard <S%G191><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Longer; <S%G2089><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1713><s%> Thy Merchants <S%G4675><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great Ones <S%G3175><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5331><s%> Thy Sorcery <S%G4675><s%> Were Misled <S%G4105><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations. <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Her The <S%G846><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of Prophets <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> Was Found, <S%G2147><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Slain <S%G4969><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>
